thread.title: Sichuan Airlines pilot was 'sucked halfway' out of window

title: Sichuan Airlines pilot was 'sucked halfway' out of window
text:
Sichuan Airlines pilot was 'sucked halfway' out of window 11:09am EDT - 01:19
The co-pilot of a Sichuan Airlines flight that was forced to make an emergency landing on Monday was “sucked halfway” out of the plane after a cockpit windshield blew out, local media reported citing the aircraft’s captain. Grace Lee reports.
The co-pilot of a Sichuan Airlines flight that was forced to make an emergency landing on Monday was “sucked halfway” out of the plane after a cockpit windshield blew out, local media reported citing the aircraft’s captain. Grace Lee reports. //reut.rs/2L2auM7
